QueryDefinition.Query: select m.encid, cast(replace(m.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint) as PersonId, case when m.encid = '' or m.encid is null then NULL else cast(replace(m.encid, 'E000','') as bigint) end as VisitOccurrenceId, m.provid, m.order_date, m.route, m.dose_frequency, m.strength, m.strength_unit, m.quantity_of_dose, m.ndc, SUBSTRING(m.ndc,1,9) ndc_9 from {sc}.medication_administrations as m JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND m.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE where ndc is not NULL order by cast(replace(m.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint)
